fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.context

Class EnvBuilderBasedContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.context.EnvBuilderBasedContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildContext

    public class EnvBuilderBasedContext
extends Object
implements BuildContext
    Context that uses a shared EnvironmentBuilder to evaluate the properties. The converter is the same as used by the EnvironmentBuilder.

    This implementation delegates registration of instances to the provided registry. Any instance may be registered.

    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public <T> T register(T instance)
        Description copied from interface: BuildContext
        Register an instance created by a builder. The instance is registered in a dedicated registry. The registry may be later used to handle registered instances. The registered instance may also be decorated at registration time.
        Specified by:
        register in interface BuildContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the registered instance (used for fluent chaining).
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to register
        Returns:
        the registered instance

      • evaluate

        public <T> T evaluate(List<String> properties,
                      Class<T> resultClass)
        Description copied from interface: BuildContext
        Evaluate a list of properties that contains expressions. It tries on first property in the list. If null value is returned then the next property is tried and so on until one property returns a non-null value.

        If all properties return null, it returns null.

        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface BuildContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of resulting value
        Parameters:
        properties - the list of properties to try in sequence
        resultClass - the result class
        Returns:
        the resulting value or null

      • newConfigurationValueBuilder

        public <P,V,T extends ConfigurationValueBuilder<P,V>> T newConfigurationValueBuilder(Function<BuildContext,T> factory)
        Description copied from interface: BuildContext
        Create a new ConfigurationValueBuilder instance using a custom factory. The factory receives the current BuildContext instance in order to associate the ConfigurationValueBuilder with this BuildContext.

        This can be useful for creating a derived instance instead of default one.

        Specified by:
        newConfigurationValueBuilder in interface BuildContext
        Type Parameters:
        P - the type of the parent
        V - the type of the value
        T - the type of the ConfigurationValueBuilder
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory used to create the instance
        Returns:
        the ConfigurationValueBuilder instance
